content.question: Is this where your {{ divorceWho }}'s divorce papers should be sent?
content.correspondence: If your {{ divorceWho }} has given you an address for the papers to be sent (known as a correspondence address) you must give that address to the court.
content.no: No, send them to a different address
content.solicitor: No, send them to their solicitor's address

respondentCorrespondenceUseHomeAddress.required: Select whether you want your {{ divorceWho }}'s divorce papers sent to this address
